location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, in charge of the Bushire Residency to Henry Willock, HM Chargé d'affaires at Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Mr Willock that thirteen cases of glassware have arrived at Bushire for Fatḥ ‘Alī Shāh Qājār, King of Persia. It notes that the goods will remain at Bushire until instructions concerning them are received from Mr Willock.
